section.title: cycle counts updating frequency of Update Cycle Count Frequency
section.para: To update the frequency of scheduled Cycle Counts, select the "Cycle Count Frequency" option. The following screen will appear:
When updating Cycle Count frequency, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to update Cycle Count frequency for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse where Cycle Count frequency is to be updated.
Select to update Cycle Count frequency for all Class Codes.
Specify Class Code whose Cycle Count frequency you want to update.
Enter a Class Code pattern to select a range of Class Codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select a number using the arrow buttons, or manually enter a value up to a maximum of 999. Value entered specifies how frequently you want to perform Cycle Counts for the specified Class designation.
